name: Continuum - Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Own all the music in the default Continuum game!

All tracks from the default Continuum game is included in this DLC. Collect them all and listen whenever you want without worrying about colliding into obstacles and all the other visuals in-game.

This DLC contains 8 tracks that is randomly shuffled in the game.

Enjoy !

Tracklist:
01 - Late Night Times - 0:56
02 - 2018 May 11 - 3:06
03 - Some Kinda Trance - 4:10
04 - Drum Mashup - 2:52
05 - FDPA - 4:45
06 - Neuro Trap Modified - 1:47
07 - ST New - 4:10
08 - 41.1 - 2:02

Created by Andy Jeon

short_description: The Original Sound Track of the game Continuum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 520

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10.5
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.14.3
  • Processor: 2.9 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
